# gux-radial-progress

Use when the progress of a task is known, this component displays a radial indicator and the completed percentage of 
the task.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                | Type     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `percentage` | `percentage` | Indicates the percentage displayed in the progress spinner | `number` |
